requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
